hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOLO.EOLO_ORDER_NO,EOLO.EOLO_LOGISTIC_NO,EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_NAME,EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_CODE,EOLO.MODIFY_TIME,EOLO.PM_CODE FROM EO_LOG_ORDER EOLO WHERE 1=1 << AND EOLO.ORG_ID=:orgId>> << AND EOLO.EOLO_ORDER_NO like :eoloOrderNo >> << AND EOLO.EOLO_LOGISTIC_NO like :eoloLogisticNo >> << AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_CODE LIKE :eoloOperateCode >> << AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoloOperateTypeCode >> << AND EOLO.MODIFY_TIME>=:modifyTimeFm >> << AND EOLO.MODIFY_TIME<=:modifyTimeTo >> ORDER BY EOLO.MODIFY_TIME DESC
